BRANCH.COMMENT: Check if FTP alias is active to work with

EXIT.COMMENT: Data source is not active to work with

RETRY.COMMENT: Retry 3 times to log on in case it failed before exit

Values.value: Start file transfer from local - %localfile% to remote location - %remotefilename%

INVOKE.COMMENT: PUT file from local to FTP site
Archive file on local after PUT
